metadata.name: Yoppy #1
metadata.description: Yoppy! All was quiet in the world as we knew it. People were in a routine, everything went its way. Everything was according to the pattern. But technology was not standing still. Humans have become dependent on them, and even through the monitor a person could fall in love with a non-existent character. And it was after this that mankind should have thought about creating something more global. One mistake and humanity could come to an end. But no one thought about it, all were immersed in their personal problems. Art and ideas turned out to be insane and endless.......ERROR Mode activated! Welcome to the Yoppy World!
